title: Venus Affairs - Shore Leave: Mission 1
description: In this first installment of the erotic adventures of the all lady crew aboard the Starship Venus, Sarah Huyhn hits a space port for shore leave where a handsome hot cyborg is ready to fulfill her every fantasy.The missions of The Venus Affairs are erotic short stories which involve intense romantic and sexual encounters between the women of the Starship Venus and all manner of alien species throughout the universe. This explicit content is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Abbi Aaker
